Ole Gunnar SolskjÃ¦r er mektig imponert over det 22 Ã¥r gamle Scott McTominay har levert for Manchester United denne sesongen. Han kaller unggutten en leder.
02 Nov 2019, 11:34 by NTB
McTominay har tilrevet seg en fast plass pÃ¥ Uniteds midtbane og stÃ¥r med to scoringer og Ã©n mÃ¥lgivende pasning pÃ¥ de fÃ¸rste ti Premier League-rundene.
Scoring ble det sÃ¥ sent som i 3-1-seieren mot Norwich i forrige serierunde.
â€“ Han har vÃ¦rt fantastisk. NÃ¥ har han og Fred fÃ¥tt til et bra samarbeid. De spiller bra sammen og gjorde det ogsÃ¥ forrige sesong, sier Ole Gunnar SolskjÃ¦r om unggutten.
McTominay og Fred fikk sjansen sammen bÃ¥de mot Arsenal og PSG sist sesong da United slet med skadeproblemer.

LEST DENNE? Liverpool-stjernens milepÃ¦l: â€“ En drÃ¸m gÃ¥r i oppfyllelse



Ole Gunnar SolskjÃ¦r gir Scott McTominay instrukser under Manchester United 1â€“0-kamp borte mot Partizan i europaligaen nylig.ğŸ“· Marko Djurica, Reuters / NTB scanpix

Marginer
Den siste tiden har duoen vÃ¦rt god, og i sÃ¦rdeleshet McTominay.
â€“ Â«ScottyÂ» har vÃ¦rt strÃ¥lende. Han er en leder. En United-gutt. Han har gÃ¥tt gradene i klubben, og du ser at han har vÃ¦rt spiss med mÃ¥let han gjorde mot Norwich. Han utvikler seg til Ã¥ bli en svÃ¦rt god midtbanespiller, sier SolskjÃ¦r.
United-manageren har i tillegg til 22-Ã¥rige McTominays prestasjoner kunnet glede seg over et resultatmessig oppsving de siste ukene. Onsdag ble det ligacupavansement mot Chelsea, og uka fÃ¸r ble det seier i europaligaen mot Partizan Beograd.
SolskjÃ¦r mener det handler om marginer.

Mot Norwich var vi Ã¥penbart gode. Selvtilliten er bedre, og det hjelper Ã¥ fÃ¥ spillere tilbake fra skade. Alt satt sammen er det ikke langt mellom fiasko og suksess, sier kristiansunderen.
Han utdyper det med marginer:
â€“ SmÃ¥ marginer avgjÃ¸r kamper pÃ¥ dette nivÃ¥et. En dommeravgjÃ¸relse eller en avgjÃ¸relse av spillerne i et viktig Ã¸yeblikk. Det er sÃ¥ mye lettere nÃ¥r du fÃ¥r selvtillit eller momentum gjennom noen resultater.

LES MER: DrÃ¸mmetrekning for SolskjÃ¦r og Manchester United



Scott McTominay jubler under Manchester Uniteds ligacupkamp mot Chelsea.ğŸ“· JOHN SIBLEY / X03811

Snudde mot Liverpool?

LÃ¸rdag er Bournemouth motstander. Det kan bli Uniteds fjerde strake seier pÃ¥ fremmed gress. FÃ¸r den rekken startet hadde SolskjÃ¦rs mannskap tapt 11 bortekamper pÃ¥ rad.

text:
Sunshine paid tribute to McTominay: - He's been fantastic
Ole Gunnar SolskjÃ¦r is mighty impressed with the 22-year-old Scott McTominay has delivered for Manchester United this season. He calls the young boy a leader.
02 Nov 2019, 11:34 by NTB
McTominay has earned a permanent place in United's midfield and stands with two scores and one goal-scoring pass in the first ten Premier League rounds.
Scoring was as late as the 3-1 win against Norwich in the previous series round.
- He's been fantastic. Now he and Fred have worked well together. They play well together and did so last season, says Ole Gunnar SolskjÃ¦r about the young boy.
McTominay and Fred got the chance together against both Arsenal and PSG last season when United struggled with injury problems.

READ THIS? Liverpool star milestone: - A dream come true



Ole Gunnar SolskÃ¦r gives Scott McTominay instructions during Manchester United's 1-0 match away against Partizan in the European league recently.ğŸ“· Marko Djurica, Reuters / NTB scanpix

margins
Lately, the duo has been good, and McTominay in particular.
- "Scotty" has been brilliant. He is a leader. A United boy. He has graduated from the club and you see that he has been pointing with the goal he made against Norwich. He is developing into a very good midfielder, â€says SolskjÃ¦r.
In addition to the 22-year-old McTominay's performance, the United manager has been able to enjoy a performance boost in recent weeks. On Wednesday it was league cup event against Chelsea, and the week before it was victory in the European league against Partizan Belgrade.
Sunshine thinks it's about margins.
- That's the way football is. Sometimes you get lucky with the dice, other times you don't. The match on Wednesday was settled with a fantastic shot by Marcus, and in Belgrade we defended very well. Against Norwich we were obviously good. Self-confidence is better and it helps to get players back from injury. Everything put together is not far between failure and success, says Kristiansunder.
He elaborates on it with margins:
- Small margins determine matches at this level. A referee's decision or decision by the players at an important moment. It's so much easier when you gain self-confidence or momentum through some results.

READ MORE: Dream draw for Solskjaer and Manchester United



Scott McTominay cheers during Manchester United's League Cup match against Chelsea.ğŸ“· JOHN SIBLEY / X03811

Turned against Liverpool?
The United boss suggests that the 1-1 match against Liverpool in the wake of the October international break may remain a minor turning point.
- The international break came at a glorious time for us. We prepared well for the Liverpool match, and when you get a good performance and a good result against the series leader, it gives you more energy, â€says SolskjÃ¦r.
Saturday is Bournemouth's opponent. It could be United's fourth straight win on foreign grass. Before that series started, SolskÃ¦r's crew had lost 11 away games in a row.
United are number seven on the Premier League table. Up to Arsenal in fifth place it separates only three points, while there are another four points up to the teams in the top four.
Bournemouth is unbeaten in four games and is in ninth place.
(Â© NTB)
